channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Active Directory Federation Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Active Directory Federation Services

item.title: CVE-2017-0043|2024-08-05T12:47:57.677Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- active%20directory%20federation%20services
item.description: Active Directory Federation Services in Microsoft Windows 10 1607, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, and Windows Server 2016 allows local users to obtain sensitive information via a crafted application, aka "Microsoft Active Directory Federation Services Information Disclosure Vulnerability."
